column5: Hey guys im leaving for Jamaica this monday for a week of fun in the sun with my girlfriend. Was wondering if anyone has fished in jamaica (negril) and if there are any recomendations for fishing guides and charters. Im more interested in fishing the flats then deep sea action but any help is appreciated. Im staying at the Riu tropical bay.... Also what tackle should i bring for messin around off shore with my extendo rod? thanks guys and good luck out there
Another OFNer asked the same question...   http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...&hl=jamaica
where in jamaica is the resort?

When in Mexico last winter our top producers were shad-type swim baits in natural colors. These things will catch anything - anywhere! Those saltwater teeth make quick work of them though. Have a good one.  >Bill
thanks guys and im staying in negril crazy hook
try ripping white bucktail jigs for jacks , had good luck doing that in Ocho rios... also fast moving minnow baits ( xraps and topwater skitter walks and zara spooks for cudas)
